title: Silver Package
description: Great for beginners or quick portfolio updates. Includes one look, studio session, and professionally edited high-res shots.

title: Platinum Package
description: Experience a full-scale fashion shoot with pro styling, location options, and high-end edits. Perfect for portfolios, magazines, or brand campaigns.

title: Gold Package
description: Ideal for models looking to expand their portfolio. Includes multiple looks, professional retouching, and studio or outdoor sessions.
